titles.title: Lord, Teach Us How to Pray Aright

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lord, teach us how to pray aright with rev'rence and with fear. though dust and ashes in your sight, we may, we must draw near.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: We perish if we cease from pray'r; Oh, grant us pow'r to pray. and when to meet thee we prepare, Lord, meet us on our way.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: Faith in the only sacrifice that can for sin atone; to cast our hopes, to fix our eyes on Christ, on Christ alone.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Give these, and then your will be done; thus strengthened with all might, we, through your Spirit and your Son, shall pray, and pray aright.
